name: Onions Have Layers
description:
Alex and their friend blew the opportunity to get tickets to a major event before they sold out, but they'll do anything before they miss out on it—anything.

They've figured out a way to get on the darker side of the internet to find a reseller, but they'll learn the hard way that getting out of these dark nooks of the web is harder than they expected, the deeper they go.

CREDITS:

  • Artist, UI designer, game design: Alexandra De los Santos https://linktr.ee/alexdart

  • Programming, art: Pio https://pi0h1.com/
